alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 10:26AM EDT until March 15 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches in the most-persistent snow. The greatest snow accumulations are expected in inland Ashtabula and western Crawford Counties. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Ohio, Ashtabula Inland county. In Pennsylvania, Crawford county. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates of one inch per hour are possible at times through this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
